name: AWACS, INC., d/b/a Comcast Metrophone v. LONDONDERRY TOWNSHIP ZONING HEARING BOARD and Londonderry Township, Intervenor. Appeal of Londonderry Township, Intervenor
name_abbreviation: Awacs, Inc. v. Londonderry Township Zoning Hearing Board

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: AWACS, INC., d/b/a Comcast Metrophone v. LONDONDERRY TOWNSHIP ZONING HEARING BOARD and Londonderry Township, Intervenor. Appeal of Londonderry Township, Intervenor.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order of Commonwealth Court reversed. See Crown Communications v. Zoning Hearing Board of Borough of Glenfield, 550 Pa. 266, 705 A.2d 427 (1997)
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John S. Halsted, Andrew D.H. Rau, Gawthrop, Greenwood & Halsted, P.C., West Chester, for Londonderry Tp.
Gerald F. McCormick, for AWACS, Inc.
Neil E. Land, Brutscher, Brutscher & Foley, Kennett Square, for Zoning Hearing Bd.
casebody.head_matter:
739 A.2d 159
AWACS, INC., d/b/a Comcast Metrophone v. LONDONDERRY TOWNSHIP ZONING HEARING BOARD and Londonderry Township, Intervenor. Appeal of Londonderry Township, Intervenor.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 20, 1999.
Decided Nov. 8, 1999.
John S. Halsted, Andrew D.H. Rau, Gawthrop, Greenwood & Halsted, P.C., West Chester, for Londonderry Tp.
Gerald F. McCormick, for AWACS, Inc.
Neil E. Land, Brutscher, Brutscher & Foley, Kennett Square, for Zoning Hearing Bd.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
